tool_description: Drillster is an open cloud based memorization platform that helps users learn more in less time. Use our API to integrate with Drillster or to create your own memorization solution.
name: Drillster 1.0
title: Drillster 1.0

api_list.name: Submit answer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster1.p.rapidapi.com/answer/0fad-6770-6ff4-990a-73cf.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update drill
api_list.description: Updates an existing drill. Meta data items are replaced where present in the request. Entries are appended to the drill, or replaced, as appropriate.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drillster1.p.rapidapi.com/drill/bDyD5Smt8CoMwIxVZHVHUw.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drillster1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
